long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
guide:human — The social curation app. 

A thoughtfully designed space for better discovery in a crazy world. 
Collect & organize the best of web. 
A beautiful home for your handpicked gems. 
Discover & consume content on your own terms. 

Our information landscape has been decaying and becoming harder to navigate by the day – the existing tools and players are not only falling behind but actively making things worse. This is one of the most pressing problems of our time. There's a sense of frustration and 'feeling trapped' by the lack of alternative.

The future of our information landscape will be healthier and easier to navigate. We hope to look back and think how primitive and chaotic things used to be. We're not okay with the status quo and watching the continued decay. We're throwing a wrench to it. Join the movement.

Discover. Save. Share. 
Join the waitlist.
